title: Places in the City
sentences: See you in the central square at seven.
está en un edificio muy antiguo.
The town hall is in a very old building.
I have to go to the police station to report a robbery.
cierra los domingos por la tarde.
The supermarket closes on Sunday afternoons.
de agua muy bonita en el parque.
There is a very beautiful water fountain in the park.
Tomorrow I'm going to the museum to see the new exhibition.
está cerca de la estación de tren.
The hospital is near the train station.
Where is the nearest bank to take out money?
es un lugar perfecto para estudiar.
The library is a perfect place to study.
I bought this book at the bookstore on the corner.
I'm going to the bakery to buy fresh bread.
My mother works in an office downtown.
I take my children to school every morning.
a ver una obra de comedia?
Do you want to go to the theater to see a comedy play?
There are many people in the stadium for the match.
He dejado el coche en el
I have left the car in the public parking lot.
The cathedral of this city is impressive.
Tengo que enviar un paquete en
I have to send a package at the post office.
está lleno de barcos de pescadores.
The port is full of fishing boats.
I buy fresh meat at the butcher shop.
porque tengo el pelo muy largo.
I'm going to the hair salon because my hair is very long.
There is a pharmacy that is open twenty-four hours.
cruza el río hacia el barrio viejo.
The bridge crosses the river toward the old neighborhood.
Do you want to have a coffee in that coffee shop?
es muy grande y tiene muchas tiendas.
The shopping mall is very big and has many stores.
